snippet.title: GRIME | Switch Announcement and Accolades Trailer
snippet.description:
ESRB Rated: TEEN for Animated Blood, Fantasy Violence
Play Today on PC: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1123050/GRIME/​

If you've been wondering what your favorite streamers have to say about GRIME, wonder no longer!

Crush your foes with living weapons and consume their essence with your sentient black hole! GRIME is a fast and unforgiving soulslike metroidvania coming soon to Nintendo Switch. Brandish the living weapons to dominate your enemies today!

To learn more about GRIME, Clover Bite, or Akupara Games, visit:
►GRIME: https://linktr.ee/playgrime
►Clover Bite: https://www.grimegame.com/​
►Akupara Games: http://linktr.ee/akuparagames
